desc: Bangkok – Ratchathevi Salary: 100,000 – 150,000 Baht/month Company Background: Our client is an insurance provider. They are now seeking a candidate for the position of Operational Excellence Manager. Job Description:  Reporting directly to the Head of Global Competence Center and playing a key role in the organization by ensuring and improving operational readiness to deliver service level expectations through designing, optimizing and harmonizing  Ensuring execution of processes while accomplishing business objectives and building an extended service offer that is designed to support clients in the Asia Pacific region Ensuring that different teams in the organization are harmonized, supported and developed in order to improve quality and productivity while maintaining optimized levels of attrition in order to ensure successful onboarding of new programs and clients in close cooperation with clients and internal stakeholders Ensuring execution of processes as defined with client and/or sending Business Unit (BU) Developing and maintaining all procedures related documentation (guidelines, process flow, etc.)  Managing the learning outcomes resulting from customer feedback to the team within the L&D established framework Making sure enquiries, assistance and/or claims are processed accurately and courteously Dealings with clients, customers and partner organizations.  Ensuring incidents are handled that result in a satisfactory outcome for customers and partners. Ensuring that the team is adequately resourced with the appropriate skills and experience Ensuring key positions are always risk managed to prevent skill / knowledge gaps in teams. Ensuring complaints are dealt with in a transparent, fair and timely manner within guidelines and established procedures Advising management of staffing needs, utilising and developing appropriate business cases for staffing. Being actively involved in the recruitment process and ensuring selection criteria is developed and adhered to during the recruitment process Develop and maintain job descriptions for all employees outlining their role and responsibilities. Maintain a performance feedback system that provides personnel with day to day feedback on their performance and ensure biannual and annual performance reviews are carried out with each person.  Qualifications:  At least 10 years working experience in consulting or customer service roles in insurance, banking or any other related business. Experience in claims’ management. Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration or any related field. Good analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent interpersonal/communication skills and an ability to build/maintain rapport with key stakeholders.  Well-developed liaison and communication skills and the capacity to negotiate and resolve conflicts with clients, staff and management.  Very good English communication skills. Computer proficient (MS Office). Leadership skills, mature and proactive.   Our client offers a benefits package including; medical insurance, annual variable bonus and provident fund. Working days: 5 days per week, 8.00am.-5.00pm. P.R. Recruitment and Business Management Co., Ltd. 2034/82 Ital - Thai Tower, 18th Floor, New Petchburi Road, Bangkapi, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10320 Tel. 02-7160000 Fax. 02-7160056 Website: WWW.PRTR.COM

desc: หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ  เสนอขายเครื่องปรับอากาศตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ติดต่อประสานงานทั้งภายในและภายนอกองค์กร จัดทำใบเสนอราคาและเสนอต่อลูกค้า ประสานงานเพื่อให้งานขายเป็นไปตามเป้าหมายของบริษัทฯ งานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากหน่วยงาน  คุณสมบัติ  เพศ ชาย/หญิง อายุไม่เกิน 30 ปี วุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี (สาขาไฟฟ้า/อิเล็กทรอนิกส์) มีความรู้พื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับเครื่องปรับอากาศ สามารถออกแบบระบบปรับอากาศ ได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีทักษะในด้านการขาย และการนำเสนองานให้กับลูกค้า ไม่จำเป็นต้องมีประสบการณ์ ยินดีรับพิจารณานักศึกษาที่จบใหม่ สามารถทำงานด้านเอกสารได้  สถานที่ปฎิบัติงาน  สถานที่ปฎิบัติงาน : ประจำสาขารามคำแหง (ซอยรามคำแหง151/1) วัน/เวลาทำงาน : วันจันทร์-วันศุกร์ หยุดเสาร์-อาทิตย์ /08.30-18.00 น. เงินเดือน : 15,000-20,000 บาท/เดือน (ไม่รวมค่าคอมมิชชั่น+ค่าเดินทาง+ค่าโทรศัพท์+ค่าอื่นๆ)  ช่องทางการติดต่อและสอบถามการสมัครงาน  Phone : 0-2256-0020 # 397 Mobile Phone : 09-5556-6513 Website : www.mahajak.com Line ID : hrmahajak Facebook : HR Mahajak    สมัครงานได้ที่ : ฝ่ายบุคคล สนใจติดต่อสมัครงานด้วยตัวเองได้ที่ : เจ้าหน้าที่สรรหาว่าจ้างเลขที่  225 อาคารมหาจักร ชั้น 2 ฝ่ายบริหารทรัพยากรบุคคล  ถนนรามคำแหง ซอยรามคำแหง151  แขวงสะพานสุง เขตสะพานสุง กรุงเทพมหานคร 10240

desc: OFFICE LOCATION:   Lad Krabang, Bangkok  REPORT TO   Marketing Manager – Asia & Africa  SPECIFIC DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:  Helping with Market Research Analysis of sales data under guidance from Marketing Manager Conduct customer satisfaction survey  Prepare presentations, writing reports and similar documents Assist with exhibitions & marketing events, as guided by the Marketing Manager  Support promotional activities releted to Marketing department  Organize & prepare Marketing Material    EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:  Bachelor degree in Business, Marketing and/or related fields (fresh graduate are welcome)  Good command of spoken and written English is must  Proficient with Microsoft office suite (Power-point, Excel, Word)    SOFT SKILLS:    Have a go getter attitude Adaptable, ability to work in team as-well-as individually  Have interest and some knowledge about Direct Marketing & Market Research       KEY MARKETING SKILL   Confidence Organizational skills Commercial awareness Adaptability Creativity Good team working skills Communication skills Numerical skills IT skills  Salary will be provided Interested applicants should submit your detailed resume stating experience and present and expected salary, including a recent photo via APPLY NOW

title: Accountant งานบัญชี > งานบัญชี งานบัญชี > งานตรวจสอบบัญชี งานบัญชี > งาน Credit Control
desc: Duties & Responsibilities;  Record accounting transactions (journal). Annual financial statement. Monthly reports (Balance sheet, P&L, Trial Balance. Supporting schedules for financial statements.  Payroll   Prepare journal vouchers, receipt vouchers and payment vouchers and other concern with accounting transaction record e.g. invoice issuing. File external and internal original documents.  Process data into accounting system. Maintain the general ledger to ensure the accounting transactions are in accordance with Thai Accounting Standards. Prepare appropriate withholding tax, monthly tax filling for input & output Tax including tax submission (PNF3, 53 &54 for withholding tax and PP30, 36 for VAT). Perform bank and balance sheet account reconciliations on a monthly basis. Prepare payment proposal for client approval. Prepare weekly cashflow report. Year End Closing. Co- ordinate and liaise with the external auditor during the year-end audit. Perform annual financial statements (comprising statements of financial position for the Bank of Thailand (*Sor Bor Chor 3/1 Form); and Submit the audited financial statements, Form Sor Bor Chor3, Form Sor Bor Chor 3/1 and supporting documents via the e-filing system of the Ministry of Commerce.  Qualification/Experience;  Female / Age not above 35 Educated in further education and/or professional qualifications advantageous. 2+ years’ experience in busy international/multicultural office environment. Ability to manage multiple tasks accurately and successfully from start to finish. Numeracy and literacy skills befitting of a regional office. Preferred Knowledge in MS Office including Microsoft, Excel, Word & Power Point.  We offer attractive salary commensurate with experiences and abilities, career development opportunities and generous fringe benefits to the successful candidate. Please submit your English resume stating working experience, current salary and expected salary together with recent photo to:   NEWBASE Thailand 5th Floor, Lumpini 1 Building, 239/2 Soi Sarasin,  Rajdamri Road Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Tel. +66 2 651 9273 to 7

title: Payroll Specialist / Supervisor งานธุรการ งานทรัพยากรบุคคล > งานบริหารค่าจ้าง งานบริหารผลตอบแทน
desc: Job Details  Monitor the payroll process, which includes obtaining data on employee, employee data based management, time and attendance, calculating pay amount, calculating deduction items such as tax, social security, provident fund Review and develop HR policies, procedures, and work process relating to compensation & benefit management to support the organization's direction and ensure local compliance and propose for management approval. Evaluating, improving and implementing the salary structure, compensation, welfare, benefits and allowance policies and systems. Set up salary structure, job matching to be guidelines for hiring successful candidate or internal transferring Analysis market data to ensure company competitiveness and ensure that compensation and benefits administration are managed properly Manage annual performance evaluation, the Mid year and year-end process and prepare HR budget including performance bonus, merit increase and promotion Providing the improvement to the current systems, policies and procedures and perform other duties as requested by Manager. Assist with the development and implementation of Compensation & Benefits and HR related projects, Report or other duties as required. Partnering with HR Business Partners to ensure that all HR initiatives are implemented and delivered effectively as plan. Develop Human Resources related reports, conduct in-depth analysis to ensure system and legal compliance. Support ad-hoc tasks designed by superior.  Qualification  Male or Female aged between 28-35 years old. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Human Resource Management, or any related field. Minimum of 5 years' experience working in Compensation & Benefits Having knowledge of salary structure and development, surveys, bench-marking and job evaluation systems will be an advantage Basic of HR Management knowledge Communication Skill/Good command of written and spoken in English (much requirement)
